    Constructors in controllers with parameters of type PacmanGame 
    Constructor Description
    CollisionController​(PacmanGame g)
    Instantiate the controller by passing the SnakeGame instance to the super class, and storing a reference to the EntityController from the game.
    Controller​(PacmanGame g)  
    EffectController​(PacmanGame g)
    Instantiates the EffectController and stores the SnakeGame instance for use later
    EntityController​(PacmanGame g)
    Instantiates the controller with the SnakeGame instance to be used later
    MapController​(PacmanGame g)
    The MapController constructor, attempts to load the maps from the 'resources/maps/' directory and handles any arising exceptions.
    SpriteController​(PacmanGame g)
    The SpriteController constructor, attempts to load the spritesheet for use later.
    UIController​(PacmanGame g)
    Instantiates the UIController with the SnakeGame instance

    GameFragment​(PacmanGame g)
    Construct the GameFragment and adjusts the sprite used to display extra lives by removing black and replacing it with the color of the wall - this is because the sprite will be drawn on top of a wall and changing the colour allows it to blend in much better
